summary: Filmmaker and evolutionary biologist Randy Olson tries to figure out if it is the Darwinists or Intelligent Design supporters who will become a flock of dodos.
cast: Michael Behe|John Calvert|Jack Cashill|Tom Givnish|Randy Olson|Erik Alden|David Bottjer|Carol Brown|Jeff Brown|John L. Burch|John Angus Campbell|Ty Carlisle|Steve Case|Michael Donoghue|Ron Etter|Daphne Fautin|Sue Gamble|Thomas Givnish|James Handen|William Harris|Ed Leydecker|Karel Liem|Donal Manahan|Kathy Martin|Diane Michelle|Bob Muller|Steven Orzack|Mark Patterson|Jane Pickering|Edward Rowand|Mark Skinner|Bill Wagon|Jonathan Wells
title: Flock of Dodos: The Evolution-Intelligent Design Circus
